issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly builds failing due to error in types_mapper
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15794](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15794). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The wheel-manylinux2014-cp37-amd64 <https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/5342884580?check_suite_focus=true> nightly build is failing because of an error in `test_array_to_pandas_types_mapper.`

The test build is using pandas 1.0.5, but the test uses `{}pd.Float64Dtype{`}, which is only introduced in a more recent version of Pandas.
